title: 's-Hertogenbosch
summary: 's-Hertogenbosch (Dutch: [ˌsɛrtoːɣə(m)ˈbɔs] (listen); French: Bois-le-Duc [bwɑ l(ə) dyk]; German: Herzogenbusch), colloquially known as Den Bosch (IPA: [dɛm ˈbɔs] (listen)), is a city and municipality in the Netherlands with a population of 154,205. It is the capital of the province of North Brabant.
